title: Ammonia storage performance of thiocyanate-based pseudo ionic liquids: experimental study and computational chemistry analysis
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,3933-3943
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00659C, Paper
Yu Cao, Kejie Jiang, Dongshun Deng
A series of novel thiocyanate-based phase-change pseudo ionic liquids (PILs) with excellent renewability have been designed for ammonia absorption and storage.
